00056 //==============================================================================
00057 // Primitive colour macros
00058 //==============================================================================
00059 #define R(c)  (((c) >>24) &0xFF)  
00060 #define G(c)  (((c) >>16) &0xFF)  
00061 #define B(c)  (((c) >> 8) &0xFF)  
00062 #define A(c)  ( (c)       &0xFF)  
00067 #define RGBA(r,g,b,a) ( (u32)( ( ((u32)(r))        <<24) |  \
00068                                ((((u32)(g)) &0xFF) <<16) |  \
00069                                ((((u32)(b)) &0xFF) << 8) |  \
00070                                ( ((u32)(a)) &0xFF      ) ) )
00071

00078 typedef  enum GRRLIB_blendMode {
00079     GRRLIB_BLEND_ALPHA  = 0,    
00080     GRRLIB_BLEND_ADD    = 1,    
00081     GRRLIB_BLEND_SCREEN = 2,    
00082     GRRLIB_BLEND_MULTI  = 3,    
00083     GRRLIB_BLEND_INV    = 4,    
00084 } GRRLIB_blendMode;
00085 
00086 #define GRRLIB_BLEND_NONE   (GRRLIB_BLEND_ALPHA)    
00087 #define GRRLIB_BLEND_LIGHT  (GRRLIB_BLEND_ADD)      
00088 #define GRRLIB_BLEND_SHADE  (GRRLIB_BLEND_MULTI)

00203 # define GRR_EXTERN
00204 # define GRR_INIT(v)     = v
00205 # define GRR_INITS(...)  = { __VA_ARGS__ }
00206 #else
00207 # define GRR_EXTERN      extern
00208 # define GRR_INIT(v)
00209 # define GRR_INITS(...)
00210 #endif
00211 
00212 GRR_EXTERN  GXRModeObj  *rmode;
00213 GRR_EXTERN  void        *xfb[2]  GRR_INITS(NULL, NULL);
00214 GRR_EXTERN  u32         fb       GRR_INIT(0);
